mapper.select: SELECT ca.account_number as account_number, c.customer_id AS customer_id, c.person_id AS person_id FROM customers c INNER JOIN customers_has_accounts ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId}
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN customers_has_accounts ON customers.customer_id = customers_has_accounts.customer_id

SELECT ca.account_number AS account_number, c.customer_id AS customer_id, c.person_id AS person_id FROM customers c JOIN persons p ON c.person_id = p.person_id JOIN customers_has_accounts ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE p.phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
